job.title: Senior Software Engineer (Javascript)
job.description:
A high-growth Series D+ enterprise software client is seeking a Senior Software Engineer (Javascript) to build intuitive user experiences, explore better ways to visualize and organize new sources of data that will help take their analytics platform to the next level.

Responsibilities
  • Design and develop the development of web applications to support stakeholders.
  • Collaborate with a team of developers to design end-to-end, industry-leading systems and solutions.
  • Rapidly prototype new ideas, concepts, and designs.
  • Research and develop new web and mobile technology applications to improve the user interface.
  • Work with agile development methodologies, adhering to best practices and pursuing continued learning opportunities.
  • Become familiar with APM concepts and existing user experiences and workflows.

Requirements
  • Proven software development experience with strong JavaScript and React fundamentals.
  • Demonstrated experience writing performant and reusable components.
  • Deep familiarity with modern Javascript (ES6+), HTML, CSS/SASS.
  • Experience working within the constraints of a design framework, querying data from a variety of sources (GraphQL, REST APIs, and key/value datastore), reviewing PRs, and applying best practices to reviews.
  • Collaborative working style and excellent communication skills.
